scripts.verify:goreli: npx truffle run verify WalletFactoryV4 --network goreli && npx truffle run verify MyToken --network goreli

scripts.verify:bsctest: npx truffle run verify WalletFactoryV4 --network bsctest && npx truffle run verify MyToken --network bsctest
scripts.verify:fuji: npx truffle run verify WalletFactoryV4 --network fuji && npx truffle run verify MyToken --network fuji
scripts.verify:ftm: npx truffle run verify WalletFactoryV4 --network ftm && npx truffle run verify MyToken --network ftm
scripts.verify:aurora: npx truffle run verify WalletFactoryV4 --network aurora && npx truffle run verify MyToken --network aurora
